attributes.name: IBANNumber
attributes.description: International Bank Account Number, ISO 13616.

attributes.name: accountId
attributes.description: General Ledger Account code for this supplier. Can be including sub-account id. It can contain many different levels to identify the account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

attributes.name: additionalAddressDetail
attributes.description: Additional detail required for the address.

attributes.name: addressAddressType
attributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

attributes.name: addressBuilding
attributes.description: The physical building address of the supplier.

attributes.name: addressCity
attributes.description: The physical city where the customer is located.

attributes.name: addressCountry
attributes.description: The country code where the supplier is physically located. Recommend ISO 3166-1 Alpha 2 or ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 format (XX or XXX).

attributes.name: addressNumber
attributes.description: The building or other number of the address of the supplier.

attributes.name: addressPostalCode
attributes.description: The postcode of the city where the customer is physically located.

attributes.name: addressRegion
attributes.description: The physical state or province where the customer is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

attributes.name: addressStreetName
attributes.description: The street where the supplier is located.

attributes.name: bankAccountId
attributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

attributes.name: bankAccountName
attributes.description: The name of the individual or company holding the bank account.

attributes.name: bankAccountNumber
attributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual's or company's own bank.

attributes.name: companyType
attributes.description: Type of company of the supplier, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar.

attributes.name: effectiveDate
attributes.description: The date the vendor declared active.

attributes.name: email
attributes.description: Email address of the primary contact.

attributes.name: expirationDate
attributes.description: The date the vendor was declared inactive.

attributes.name: fax
attributes.description: Fax number for the supplier.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: The first (given) name of the person.

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: The last (family) name of the person.

attributes.name: legalEntityIdentifier
attributes.description: Third party registration number given by local authorities / local regulators, e.g. company registration number.

attributes.name: modeOfPayment
attributes.description: Should identify mode of payment, e.g. cash, check, account transfer, etc.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the supplier.

attributes.name: paymentDiscountDays
attributes.description: The number of days from the invoice date the supplier allows to take advantage of discounted terms. Terms are represented as digits with no decimal places, e.g. nnn.

attributes.name: paymentDiscountPercentage
attributes.description: The discount percentage the supplier may provide if an invoice is paid before a certain number of days.

attributes.name: paymentDueDays
attributes.description: The number of days allowed to meet the obligation before an invoice becomes overdue.

attributes.name: primaryContactTelephone
attributes.description: Phone number of the primary contact at the supplier.

attributes.name: primaryContactTitle
attributes.description: The title of the person, e.g. accounting manager.

attributes.name: primaryCurrency
attributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the supplier, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

attributes.name: registrationCountry
attributes.description: Supplier country of registration, e.g. USA, UK, India, etc.

attributes.name: registrationNumber
attributes.description: Unique number to identify the company in the accounting records, issued by a government authority or created by the company for internal purposes to identify different entities within their corporate group.

attributes.name: registrationPlace
attributes.description: Supplier place of registration, could be district e.g. Houston, Raleigh, Durham, etc.

attributes.name: registrationState
attributes.description: Supplier state of registration, e.g. Texas, NC, SC, Ontario, etc.

attributes.name: secondaryEmail
attributes.description: Supplier's secondary contact email ID.

attributes.name: secondaryTelephone
attributes.description: Supplier's secondary contact telephone number.

attributes.name: selfBillingIndicator
attributes.description: Indicator showing if a self-billing agreement exists between the customer and the supplier.

attributes.name: sortCode
attributes.description: Identifier for the bank branch at which the account is held. May be needed to uniquely identify the account.

attributes.name: supplierCreditLimit
attributes.description: The credit limit for the total outstanding balance approved for the supplier.

attributes.name: supplierGroup
attributes.description: If the organization segments suppliers into groups, the group to which this supplier is assigned.

attributes.name: supplierId
attributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due or from whom unused credits have been applied.

attributes.name: supplierType
attributes.description: The type of supplier.

attributes.name: systemApprovedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

attributes.name: systemApprovedUser
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

attributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
attributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

attributes.name: systemEntryUser
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

attributes.name: systemModifiedDateTime
attributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

attributes.name: systemModifiedUser
attributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

attributes.name: taxAuthority
attributes.description: Identification of the revenue body to which this taxType refers.

attributes.name: taxNumber
attributes.description: The supplier's tax identification number.

attributes.name: taxRegistrationNumber
attributes.description: Unique number issued by a revenue body for use by the company.

attributes.name: taxType
attributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

attributes.name: taxVerificationDate
attributes.description: The date that the tax registration details referred to above were last checked.

attributes.name: transactionCreditLimit
attributes.description: The per invoice credit limit established with this supplier.

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: website
attributes.description: URL of supplier website.
